title: Parler halts intent of sale to Kanye West, parent company announces
description: Though Parler said it cut ties in November with the rapper now known as Ye, the statement came hours after he unleashed a flurry of antisemitic comments lauding Nazis.

title: Virulently antisemitic comments by Ye spark new GOP criticism
description: A Twitter account representing House Judiciary Committee Republicans also deleted a post appearing to praise the rapper formerly known as Kanye West after his praise for Adolf Hitler.
